description: Append n-th Fibonacci number to previous term, reverse alternate terms.
links: Felice Russo, A set of new Smarandache functions, sequences and conjectures in number theory, American Research Press, 2000.
mathematica: Module[{nn=20,fibs},fibs=Fibonacci[Range[nn]]; Flatten[{#[[1]], FromDigits[ Reverse[IntegerDigits[#[[2]]]]]}&/@Partition[ Table[ FromDigits[ Flatten[IntegerDigits/@Take[fibs,n]]],{n,nn}],2]]](* _Harvey P. Dale_, Aug 18 2014 *)
author: _Felice Russo_, Feb 25 2000
extensions: Corrected and extended by _Harvey P. Dale_, Aug 18 2014
